name: ADVentura - The Explorer - Corona GordaÂ
additionalNotes: The ADVentura The Explorer is a medium-strength cigar that is handmade in the Dominican Republic. The Explorer features an Ecuadorian Habano wrapper draped over an Ecuadorian Sumatra binder and a blend of Dominican and Ecuadorian tobaccos that have been aged for 5 to 7 years. The ADVentura The Explorer provides interesting notes of spice and chocolate with an overall sweetness.
